products.name: Keratin Shampoo
products.desc: Gently cleanses hair and scalp, strengthening the inner hair structure. Promotes an increase in volume from roots to tips. It gives hair elasticity, providing extra shine, restores strength and volume to dull and lifeless hair. The main active ingredient of the shampoo is keratin. It is woven into the structure of each hair, reconstructs the injured areas, thickens and smoothes from the inside. Due to its ability to accumulate in hair, it thickens them along its entire length, makes it visually thicker and more voluminous, gives elasticity, silkiness and rich glossy shine.

Unlike many other plastic bodied waxing machines, this item is very easy and convenient to clean inside and out. If the hot wax gets spilt on to the plastic waxing machine, it is very difficult to get off them, making them an eye-sore. With Inter waxing machines thanks to it’s durable, high quality premium built aluminium and white metal body, simply wipe the spilt wax away and the dirt is gone! Also ultra-resistant to scratches and accidental drops. Has an intelligent variable temperature control up to 120 degrees alongside an indicator light. The waxing machine switches off once it has reached the required heat as requested. When the temperature is lower than the set time, the indicator will turn on again. The great Inter Professional Depilatory Waxing Machines is suitable for all types of hot body hair waxes hard waxing, strip waxing and paraffin waxing. Comes in a large capacity of 800ml.

products.desc: Predictably from a company with their high standard of quality, the Derby Single Edge Razor Blades beat most to solving a common problem. products.desc:
Barbers have always loved the Wahl Senior  Clipper for its powerful motor and the Cordless Senior has all that power too, generating a high blade speed with increased torque that’ll clip even the thickest hair with ease.

Powered by a lithium ion battery, the Senior will give up to 70 minutes run time and takes just 70 mins to charge up.

All that power drives a thin profile blade with a flat bottom for closer cutting and precision fades. It can be adjusted to zero overlap via the thumb taper lever, giving you outstanding clipping options and instantly adjustable flexibility.

Wahl Balding Clipper 5 Star
PROFESSIONAL PRECISION: From Wahl Professional’s commercial grade line of products, the 5-Star Balding Clipper is intended for professional use only and also is designed to deliver the sharp performance that experts demand.
STYLISH AND FUNCTIONAL: This corded clipper is a barbershop must-have. With a powerful electromagnetic motor that cuts twice the speed of pivot motors, it offers barbers and stylists a surgically-close cut, making it perfect for quick, precise, and also effortless skin and bald fades.
ACCESSORIES INCLUDED: For your convenience, the 5-Star Balding Clipper comes with all accessories required for use. Package includes the clipper, (2) attachment combs, oil, cleaning brush, instructions, and also red blade guard.
PRODUCT SPECIFICATIONS: The 5-Star Balding Clipper (#8110) measures 6.25” long and also weighs 1 lb. This product features an 8-foot, professional grade, chemical resistant cord and features a #2105 blade, V5000+ electromagnetic motor, and operates at 120 volts/60 hertz.

Why use 3 different products when one easy to use, economical and proven product will meet all of your needs? For metal hair clippers and implements, this exclusive 5-in-1 formula disinfects, lubricates, cleans, cools and prevents rust in 10 minutes or less!

Disinfects: Complies with OSHA and state board rules. EPA-registered bactericide, fungicide and virucide. Kills HIV-1 and TB.

Lubricates blades: Clippercide leaves a thin film of lubricant that reduces friction and keeps blades sharp

Cleans: Aerosol spray blows hair, dust and particles from between clipper teeth

Cools: Aerosol spray cools blades on contact

Prevents rust: Anti-rust formula protects blades and prolongs clipper life!
products.name: Clippercide Spray
Solution
products.desc:

For use in professional salons, barber shops and spas
Anti-rust formulation protects tools
Will not stain skin or surfaces
Safe for non-porous surfaces including tanning beds, metals, stainless steel, plastics, combs, brushes, rollers and shears
